song.title: A War Without Weapons
song.info:
Allready the 5th Trance-Dream hits from Cyborg Jeff in one week. Rhythm of great productions was growing fast ! In this new song, I once again mixed piano’s melody as in Robert Miles songs with here a second voices using an electronic instrument close to the Adlib FM sounds of the Yamaha OPL3 that we could hear in the MS-DOS PC version of the game Nicky Boom…. Some sounds was also sampled out of Waxattack and Ice Mc titles. This flying melodies, i re-try to work on it many times. The best version was an update of this one in 1997 that you could hear in the anniversary album « We Want More« . A war witout weapons…. with only musical notes….
project : Planer n'est pas jouer project download : http://www.jamendo.com/fr/album/22103 youtube : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uFxJPkg0-5E
